introduction: Welcome to Padget’s Smart SMT Line! I’m Maalinee, your AI assistant for Machine Intelligence & Notifications. Let me introduce our Koh Young SPI & AOI machines, the heart of our quality assurance process in Surface Mount Technology (SMT)

faqs.question: What is AOI
faqs.answer: The Koh Young AOI acts as the final gatekeeper of quality after reflow soldering. It performs 3D post-reflow inspection to ensure: Correct component placement (checks for missing, misaligned, or wrong parts). Perfect solder joints (detects bridging, tombstoning, lifted leads, or insufficient solder). Benefits : Guarantees 100% inspection of all boards before shipment. Reduces manual visual inspection needs. Helps achieve consistent product quality for complex PCBs.

faqs.question: What is the Current Yield
faqs.answer: First Pass Yield (FPY):97.2%. False Call Rate : 0.5%

faqs.question: Advantages of AOI machine
faqs.answer: Zero-defect quality levels. Reduced rework & production delays. High customer satisfaction through consistent performance.
